PageInfo.Message:
Enemies that give <COL ffdc78>Corruption status
abnormality</COL> have started to appear.
When affected by the Corruption status
abnormality, your health gradually decreases over
time, and your movements become slower, eventually
leading to death.
When you are exposed to the <COL
ffdc78>Corruption Spores</COL> released by
Corruption demons, the Corruption status
abnormality value accumulates, so be careful not
to keep approaching them.

Furthermore, when the Corruption-infected monster
that has not released its Corruption spores comes
into contact with the spores, it mutates and
spreads the spores.
Let's assess the condition of the enemy and
consider the order in which to defeat them.

Abnormal corruption states can be prevented by
using <COL ffdc78>Anti-Corruption Medicine</COL>.
It is also possible to recover by using <COL
ffdc78>Corruption Cure</COL> or through the <COL
ffdc78>relief actions of allies</COL>.
When standing still, you can receive relief
actions by having your allies touch you.

Healers have the trait of fast recovery speed for
corruption through touch.
If your allies are afflicted with the corruption
status ailment, actively heal them and support
each other.
